q1: Who is the best player on Real Madrid?
q2: Raúl is Real Madrid's most capped player with 741 appearances for the club.With 167 caps, Iker Casillas made the most international appearances as a Real Madrid player.
q4: Real Madrid colors are white especially and sometimes black
a5: Main colors are White with Blue and Gold accents. They play in all White kits at home and all Black kits away.
